title: Did the Snapchat channel "Cosmo after Darkness " offer children pornography?
subtitle: "Cosmo after Darkness" will show the content about sex, but this Snapchat channel is not porn and will only be available to 18 viewers and over.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Snapchat channel "Cosmo after Darkness" offers pornographic material and will be offered to 13-year-old children.
